SEARCH
Module com.example.Pong
Package Control

Class BallManager

java.lang.Object
Control.BallManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class BallManager extends Object implements Runnable
The BallManager class manages the behavior and movements of the ball in the game.

    • player2Scores

      public boolean player2Scores(Game game)
      Checks if player 2 scores by detecting if the ball crosses the left boundary.
      Parameters:
      game - The game model
      Returns:
      true if player 2 scores, false otherwise

      racket1 - Racket object for player 1

    • handleBoundaryCollision

      public void handleBoundaryCollision(Ball ball, Player player1, Player player2, double initialSpeed)

      Parameters:
      ball - The ball object
      player1 - Player 1 object
      player2 - Player 2 object
      initialSpeed - The initial speed of the ball
